features: NATURE INSPIRED FRAGRANCE: Travel to the Lavender fields of Provence, balanced by the sweet nectar of Honey Blossoms
ESSENTIAL OILS: The lavender essential oil in this fragrance is responsibly sourced in Southern France, honoring the traditional craftsmanship of the local farmers
RESPONSIBLY SOURCED NATURAL INGREDIENTS: No Dyes, No Phthalates, No Animal Testing on final product
RESPONSIBLY MANUFACTURED: 100% Recyclable Box. Product comes from a 0% landfill plant
LONG LASTING FRAGRANCE to USE IN MANY ROOMS: Provides up to 60 days of continuous fragrance per refill on low setting. Use in the living room, bathroom, bedroom, hallways, kitchens and office
body.description: Travel to the Lavender fields of Provence, balanced by the sweet nectar of Honey Blossoms. The lavender essential oil in this fragrance is responsibly sourced in Southern France, honoring the traditional craftsmanship of the local farmers, which helps to preserve it for future generations. Enhance your home’s scent with Botanica NonAerosol Room Spray. It has no dyes, no animal testing on final product, no phthalates, no acetone, no propellants. Instant fragrance so your home always smells welcoming and fresh. Botanica Room Sprays contain natural essential oils.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Breath of Fresh Air: Botanica Air Wick Plug-Ins
reviews.reviewText: I recently discovered the Botanica Air Wick Plug-Ins, and I must say, they've transformed the atmosphere in our home. With two energetic Golden Retrievers, maintaining a fresh and inviting scent can be a challenge. However, these plug-ins have proven to be a game-changer.One of the standout features of the Botanica Air Wick Plug-Ins is their ability to create a natural and inviting aroma. The scent is not overpowering, which is a common concern in many air fresheners. Instead, it strikes a perfect balance that instantly uplifts the ambiance without being too strong or artificial.What truly amazed me is the lasting power of these plug-ins. Despite having two furry companions who love to explore the great outdoors, our home consistently exudes a pleasant fragrance. The Botanica range offers a variety of scents inspired by nature, and we've received numerous compliments from everyone who walks through our door. It's become a common occurrence for guests to ask, "What's that amazing smell?"Even with our beloved Golden Retrievers in the mix, the Botanica Air Wick Plug-Ins effectively neutralize pet odors, leaving our living spaces smelling fresh and clean. It's a relief to have a product that not only masks unwanted scents but also adds a touch of nature-inspired fragrance to our home.Installation is a breeze – simply plug in the device, choose your preferred fragrance setting, and let it work its magic. The refillable design ensures that the captivating scents keep flowing, making it a cost-effective and convenient solution for maintaining a welcoming home environment.Our guests consistently comment on how great our home smells, and we credit it all to these fantastic plug-ins. It's a small investment that goes a long way in creating a pleasant and inviting atmosphere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Probably the best Air Wick scent you’ll ever have.
reviews.reviewText: “Where did you get this Air Wick scent?” is the most common question our guests at the house ask when they first come in contact with it. It’s this honey-like lavender scent that smells really great and is quick to get your attention if you’ve never smelled it.Price tag is steep so we don’t get it too often but when we do, it’s a real delight to smell. We’ve only been able to find it here on Amazon as Walmart, Target, and other places near me lack this specific kind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars French Lavender and Honey Blossom is like a sweet flowery potpourri fragrance through all the house.
reviews.reviewText: Thank you dear product developers! This French Lavender and Honey Blossom is a hit!I will tell you honestly. I quit buying Air Wick refills altogether. A couple of years ago, the company quietly discontinued the Lavender and replaced it on the shelf with (an almost identically packaged) and awful smelling (IMHO) Lavender and Chamomile. It smelled like cheap cologne, that hit my olfactory sharply when I entered a room with a warmer. But, I digress.I will say, the new scent is not as beloved to MY olfactory as the old Air Wick Lavender, or the even the Lavender and Vanilla, that I have been using in it's absence.But, of it's own merit, the French Lavender Honey is very, very pleasant and fancier flowery scent. And it seems to be a slighter stronger scent. The AC carries it gently throughout the whole house and my peeps approve. To me, it seems like a potpourri smell I experienced in the past, from a closet or a chest. Although I have only used it a week and half, it seems to me it will it last as long as other refills. I put the one of the Air Wick warmers in the the laundry room, and another in the AC/Furnace closet. I use the gentler fragrance Lavender and Vanilla in locations that are physically close to people (dining table, home office, near living room recliner) and I turn those down so they last longer, and are only barely noticeable. I use the giant Mediterranean Lavender warmers in the bath.This product does not come in blister packs. It is boxed, bottles loosely sitting in two cardboard trays. As some reported, a couple of my bottles leaked a little on the cardboard during shipment. I used those two bottles for my warmers. And then I stored the trays under my bathroom sink. So, I don't even consider it to be any problem that they leaked a tiny bit. I bought the ten pack, and the price per bottle is close to the price I pay per bottle in the five packs (of mostly inferior scents IMHO) available in the grocery store. I am so happy to put my stored Air Wick warmers back to work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great smell - last at least 60 days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells great but very strong
reviews.reviewText: I have one air wick in every room but for this scent I only need 3 plugged in. 2 downstairs and 1 upstairs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: 10 pods. The scent is phenomenal! I could smell it through the box as I was carrying it up to my apartment and actually thought someone had just walked through with a nice, vanilla based cologne at first.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This air freshener in Caribbean Sweetgrass and Sandalwood smells amazing. We have 2 of the plug-ins in our small office and every patient that comes in comments on how great the office smells. When the plug-ins are set to High or just under, they last for 2-3 weeks and the smell is just as strong when they stop working as the first day. They do not gradually lose scent and are not overpowering either. I hope this is a scent that is not discontinued in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Definitely a good product; long lasting good smell throughout the house
I was scared it would smell too much like vanilla and make my house smell too sweet, but it’s just the right balance between flowery and vanilla. I love it!

reviews.reviewTitle: A Tranquil Oasis for Your Home!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Air Wick Botanica Essential Oils in the Himalayan Magnolia & Vanilla scent, and I couldn't be happier with my decision. This scented oil is a true game-changer for creating a refreshing and inviting atmosphere in my home.💚 Long-Lasting Scent:The longevity of the scent is impressive. A little goes a long way, and I love how the fragrance lingers in the air without being overpowering. It's the perfect balance that transforms my home into a serene and welcoming space.🌍 Elevating Home Fragrance:The Himalayan Magnolia & Vanilla combination is a heavenly blend. The floral notes coupled with the sweet undertones of vanilla create a harmonious aroma that uplifts the ambiance of any room. It's like having a fragrant garden indoors!
